explains: n. 教育工作者，教师；教育家

sentences.en: What more could an educator hope for than a student's desire to learn.
sentences.cn: 除了学生的学习兴趣，教育者们别无所求。

sentences.en: The television producer today has to be part news person, part educator.
sentences.cn: 今天的电视制作人必须一半是新闻人，一半是教育者。

sentences.en: Hamilton isn't the only educator crossing the Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 汉密尔顿并不是唯一一个跨越大西洋（去外国任职）的教育家。
